rer@yahoo. com writes:

 

I have placed a little something on top of my co=
mputer  monitor, right in 
front of me. It is now 7/10/2010. I will leave i=
t  there 4 days, and remove 
it Noon Denver time, on Wednesday,  7/14/2010.=


All you have to do is ask your boxes/spirits/  aliens/etc, what it is.

 have taken a picture of it, and  posted it to the files section here, so

there is no way I can squirm  out of the results:

oo. com/group/  EVP-ITC/files/ RJ/RJ.20100710.

yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/RJ/RJ.20100710.1.zip) 

Please do not try to =

download it to  you=
r computer beforehand, so you can be sure I won't change 
it  during, or af=
ter, the test.

Answers anyone reveals after noon  Wednesday don't count. P=
artial answers 
(like just the color, or  shape, or some emotion vibe) don'=
t count. Just tell 
me what it  is.

Best of Luck. I hope for this to be a =
regularly occurring  experiment, and 
I hope we all can learn from the resu=
lts.
